alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:27AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jones and Fisher Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 125 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms approaching northern Fisher and Jones counties, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Rotan, Roby, Hawley, Lueders, Sylvester, Noodle, Hobbs, Mccaulley, Avoca, Longworth, Neinda, Nugent, Funston, The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Ranch Road 126, Hitson and Tuxedo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
